trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>您指定的處理常式中的工具提示文字會顯示事件，每當滑鼠指標位於儲存格和控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>屬性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要顯示由目前的狀態或儲存格的值決定的工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當滑鼠指標進入儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用這項資訊來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多個資料格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一開始包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果已設定資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
